name: ListEventTypes
description:
Fetches event types for a specified user or organization.

This tool retrieves all event types associated with a specified user or organization in Calendly. Use it when you need to get a list of event types for scheduling or management purposes.

parameters.name: organization_uri
parameters.description: URI to view available personal, team, and organization event types.

value_schema.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the organization's URI.

parameters.name: user_uri
parameters.description: The user's URI to view associated personal, team, and organization event types.

value_schema.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the user's URI.

parameters.name: user_availability_schedule_filter
parameters.description: Filters event types by the given primary availability schedule when used with the 'user' parameter.

value_schema.description: Used in conjunction with `user` parameter, returns a filtered list of Event Types that use the given primary availability schedule.

parameters.name: sort_event_types_by
parameters.description: Specify field and direction to order results. Use {field}:{asc/desc}. Fields: name, position, created_at, updated_at.

value_schema.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values.Supported fields are: name, position, created_at, updated_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

parameters.name: pagination_token
parameters.description: Token to retrieve the next or previous set of event types in pagination.

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: number_of_event_types_to_return
parameters.description: The number of event types to return. Specify the desired count of returned rows.

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

parameters.name: return_active_event_types_only
parameters.description: Set to true to return only active event types, false for only inactive, or omit to include all event types.

value_schema.description: Return only active event types if true, only inactive if false, or all event types if this parameter is omitted.

parameters.name: only_admin_managed
parameters.description: Return only admin managed event types if true, exclude them if false, or include all if omitted.

value_schema.description: Return only admin managed event types if true, exclude admin managed event types if false, or include all event types if this parameter is omitted.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the calendly API.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: Return only active event types if true, only inactive if false, or all event types if this parameter is omitted.

value_schema.description: Return only active event types if true, only inactive if false, or all event types if this parameter is omitted.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the organization's URI.

value_schema.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the organization's URI.

parameters.name: user
parameters.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the user's URI.

value_schema.description: View available personal, team, and organization event types associated with the user's URI.

parameters.name: user_availability_schedule
parameters.description: Used in conjunction with `user` parameter, returns a filtered list of Event Types that use the given primary availability schedule.

value_schema.description: Used in conjunction with `user` parameter, returns a filtered list of Event Types that use the given primary availability schedule.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values.Supported fields are: name, position, created_at, updated_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

value_schema.description: Order results by the specified field and direction. Accepts comma-separated list of {field}:{direction} values.Supported fields are: name, position, created_at, updated_at. Sort direction is specified as: asc, desc.

parameters.name: admin_managed
parameters.description: Return only admin managed event types if true, exclude admin managed event types if false, or include all event types if this parameter is omitted.

value_schema.description: Return only admin managed event types if true, exclude admin managed event types if false, or include all event types if this parameter is omitted.

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

value_schema.description: The token to pass to get the next or previous portion of the collection

parameters.name: count
parameters.description: The number of rows to return

value_schema.description: The number of rows to return

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
